pos_sample_comments.comment: Then I HAD to order another box because they work so well I wanted them in my guest house, my barn and my garage!
BEST INVENTION YET, no more poisons in my house, NO MORE UNWANTED CREATURES at all!.!.
My mom is here and sleeping soundly in the guest bedroom and I have these little miracles to thank!
Garage, 2 bedrooms, living room.
I put these things in every room of the house and in my classroom as well.
Placed them around our house and garage.
With these plugged in throughout my house, I have had much less mess.
I think the key here is to put one in every room of the house.
We aren't seeing any bugs in the house.

sample_comments.comment: Then I HAD to order another box because they work so well I wanted them in my guest house, my barn and my garage!
We plugged in two of these within a few feet of the the ants infestation for two weeks and the ants are still there and totally unaffected.
I put these things in every room of the house and in my classroom as well.
Once I bought gel bait and put some borax around the house the roaches were gone.
Garage, 2 bedrooms, living room.
I had high hopes for this as our house we know has small gaps where flies and spiders get in, especially during the summer months, and we also have mice in our barn due to our farm.
BEST INVENTION YET, no more poisons in my house, NO MORE UNWANTED CREATURES at all!.!.
In fact, I literally saw a spider hanging out in a corner 20 INCHES AWAY FROM THE DEVICE.
My mom is here and sleeping soundly in the guest bedroom and I have these little miracles to thank!

neg_sample_comments.comment: In fact, I literally saw a spider hanging out in a corner 20 INCHES AWAY FROM THE DEVICE.

pos_sample_comments.comment: These really work great and no messy sprays, etc.
With these plugged in throughout my house, I have had much less mess.
When I got back I found a lot of spider egg sacs which I vacuumed.
The wife was cleaning up webs weekly and they've all but stopped .
Despite that and thoroughly cleaning with eucalyptus and peppermint oil spray, I kept seeing 3-7 baby spiders on the bottom baseboard in my daughters room EVERYDAY.
We are very clean but because my apartment is soooo old, the owner has yet to rent the building and rid of the pests.
I keep the house super clean and the roaches still come .

sample_comments.comment: The ones I've gotten rid off have been through sticky glue traps and D-con poison.
